model

Class SubstitutionSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.SubstitutionSet

  • public class SubstitutionSet
extends Object
    This class represents the bindings of different variables to unify to expression or in the context of a solution to a clause.

    The bindings are stored as Unifiable in a Map sorted by Variable object.

    Author:
    Alexandre Camus

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(Variable v,
       Unifiable expr)
        Adds the specified binding to the substitution set.
        Parameters:
        v - the variable that is bound by the binding.
        expr - the expression to which the variable is bound.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Deletes all the bindings.

      • getBinding

        public Unifiable getBinding(Variable v)
        Gets the binding of the specified variable.
        Parameters:
        v - the variable of the binding to get.
        Returns:
        a Unifiable object that represent the expression to which the variable is bound.

      • isBound

        public boolean isBound(Variable v)
        Checks if the specified variable has a binding.
        Parameters:
        v - the variable to check if it is bound.
        Returns:
        true if the variable is bound, otherwise false.

      • toString
